definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: In addition to reducing rent and interest rates, the government has made the payment of them mandatory.
sentences.chinese: 而在減租減息之外，政府還規定必須交租交息。

sentences.english: Many economists expect a quarter-point cut at that meeting.
sentences.chinese: 許多經濟學家預計下一次會議上將減息25個基點。

sentences.english: Interest has been generally reduced in Anhua, and there have been reductions in other counties, too.
sentences.chinese: 安化已普遍地減了息，他縣亦有減息的事。

sentences.english: We also incited the masses to struggle for rent and interest rates reductions.
sentences.chinese: 就是在減租減息發動羣衆上，我們也做了一些工作。

definition: hawk faction (opposite: 鸽派, doves)/fierce and combative party/war party/warmongers
(economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
dove faction (opposite: 鹰派, hawks)/peace party/the faction seeking peace
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
